price: 39. Dhammaan waxaanu siinnay oo u yeelnay tusaalooyin (mase rumeyn), dhammaanna waan halaagnay halaagid.
arabic: وَكُلّٗا ضَرَبۡنَا لَهُ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلَۖ وَكُلّٗا تَبَّرۡنَا تَتۡبِيرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wakullan ḍarabnā lahu al-amthāla wakullan tabbarnā tatbīran
